title: What is this?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Ive never seen this before?

Is this a thing?
How does one do it?
How long has it been there?
Has it always been there?
Why have people not been doing it?


What?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Aha I came across this just last game and asked the guys on NA what it was. Apparently it's a /me command that basically works like the emote chat in MMOs like WoW and ESO.

Ohhhhhhh ok, thats cool.

I wonder why it has never been mentioned xD
It'd be cool to turn the whole pick-call phase into that (in blind pick anyway)

It might solve a lot of disputes.

I believe it's a new feature this patch and is certainly the kinda thing most people (myself included) would overlook in the patch notes. It's also possible it wasn't in the patch notes at all, maybe it got missed.

I took a quick squiz at the patch notes back until 7.1 and couldn't find anything relevant to this feature. Either it wasn't mentioned at all or it was just a single instance (likely ages ago).

Honestly, I'm surprised Riot didn't announce this feature and just go "we'll be using this to assess reports regarding multiple players attempting to take the same role/position". Would solve so many problems with insta-lockers, trolls and people who just don't want to cooperate.

It's not anything so advanced as that. It's basically just a different way of typing. All it would accomplish would be people typing /me chooses [role] and having it show up in a diff font instead of just typing what role they want.

It's just a formatting command, not any kind of selection based command.

At best it's become the 'formal' way of calling a role but then you'd just have people arguing over "I called first" "but I called *properly* first".
This is actually super cool! Ahh I can't wait to confuse my friends next time we queue together haha

Done this in one of my recent games, and you could hear the stunned amazement of my teammates because they didn't know how to do it XD 

{{champion:32}}
